# Human Firewall: Security Awareness Resources

This page contains additional resources, references, and tools to support your learning journey in security awareness and program development.

## Security Awareness Frameworks and Guides

### Program Development Frameworks
- [SANS Security Awareness Maturity Model](https://www.sans.org/security-awareness-training/blog/security-awareness-maturity-model/) - Framework for program development
- [NIST SP 800-50](https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-50/final) - Building an Information Technology Security Awareness Program
- [NIST SP 800-16](https://csrc.nist.gov/publications/detail/sp/800-16/rev-1/draft) - Information Security Training Requirements
- [ISO/IEC 27001:2022 Annex A.7.2.2](https://www.iso.org/standard/27001) - Information security awareness, education, and training
- [CIS Controls v8 - Control 14](https://www.cisecurity.org/controls) - Security Awareness and Skills Training

### Behavior and Culture Models
- [Security Culture Framework](https://securitycultureframework.net/) - Methodology for building security culture
- [BJ Fogg Behavior Model](https://www.bjfogg.com/behavior-model) - Understanding motivation, ability, and prompts
- [COM-B Model](https://www.ucl.ac.uk/behaviour-change/sites/behaviour_change/files/bcw_manual.pdf) - Capability, Opportunity, Motivation, Behavior
- [MINDSPACE Framework](https://www.bi.team/publications/mindspace/) - Influences on behavior
- [Security Behavior Intentions Scale (SeBIS)](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/2702123.2702249) - Measuring security attitudes

- [Microsoft Digital Defense Report](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/security/business/microsoft-digital-defense-report) - Global threat trends
